title: Repo sync

details: Added 7 new Apify secret types (API tokens, proxy passwords) with push protection
Introduced Azure ML Internal Service Principal Key detection

summary:

- Introduced Azure ML Internal Service Principal Key detection

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added 7 new Apify secret types (API tokens, proxy passwords) with push protection
- Introduced Azure ML Internal Service Principal Key detection
- Updated `hasValidityCheck` to conditional checks for multiple providers (Brevo, Checkout.com, Contentful, etc)
- Changed Contentful Personal Access Token visibility from private to public
- Updated config.json SHA references

### Title
Add Apify/Azure secret patterns and update validity checks
